title: Review Schema
description: Schema representing a review invitation for a film.

filmId.description: Unique identifier of the film for which a review invitation has been issued.

reviewerId.description: Unique identifier of the user who has received the review invitation.

completed.description: Indicates whether the review has been completed.

reviewDate.description: The date when the review has been completed, expressed as a string in YYYY-MM-DD format.

rating.description: User's rating of the review, from 0 to 10.
